attributes.action: Ban Jobby Scott from opening his mouth as his chat is so bad it causes gargoyles to cry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jobby Scott is a person who's chat is diabolical. IT IS RANK. If you have never heard it cut your ears from your head in case in the future you do. For those of you who have experienced this terror, hell only awaits as no doubt you have already committed suicide.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
